definition: Five Sacred Mountains of the Daoists, namely: Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong, Mt Hua 華山|华山[Hua4 Shan1] in Shaanxi, Mt Heng 衡山[Heng2 Shan1] in Hunan, Mt Heng 恆山|恒山[Heng2 Shan1] in Shanxi, Mt Song 嵩山[Song1 Shan1] in Henan
five/5

sentences.english: Three cups spit promise, the five mountains fall into light.
sentences.chinese: 三杯吐然诺，五岳倒为轻。

sentences.english: For example, Tai Mountain is called "East Yue" as it is the easternmost one of the five.
sentences.chinese: 如泰山是五岳中最东的一座，因而名为东岳。

sentences.english: Mountains of sword send justice alliance, and the teaching counter.
sentences.chinese: 五岳剑派组成正义联盟，与魔教抗衡。

sentences.english: Taishan is one of five mountains, the ancient name "Zong", the beginning of Spring and Autumn Period, said Tarzan.
sentences.chinese: 泰山是五岳之一，古名“岱宗”，春秋时始称泰山。

sentences.english: Li said that "three cups of spit promise, back to Light Five Sacred Mountains."
sentences.chinese: 李白说“三杯吐然诺，五岳倒为轻。”

sentences.english: The voice resounded across the heavens.
The Huangshan Mountain is very famous in China.
sentences.chinese: 引导学生说出中国的五岳名山。

sentences.english: Five Mountains in China, and once called the West Mountain in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 它是中国五岳之一，在古代被称为西岳。

sentences.english: Today I would like to introduce Mount Tai, the most revered one of China's five sacred mountains.
sentences.chinese: 今天我向各位介绍号称我国五岳之首的泰山。

sentences.english: Mount Tai in Shandong province is one of China's five sacred mountains.
sentences.chinese: 泰山在山东是中国五岳之一。

sentences.english: Nanyue mountain is one of the five most famous mountains in China .
sentences.chinese: 它是中国五岳之一，在古代被称为西岳。

sentences.english: Ask for the five sword spirit griffin to why.
sentences.chinese: 反问五岳剑派上灵鹫来为何。
